articles.description: Uddhav Thackeray and Eknath Shinde have been asked to submit documents to prove their majority members in Shiv Sena.

articles.description: The BJP may lack elected MPs and MLAs from Kerala but the party's state unit is on cloud nine over NDA's Droupadi Murmu possibly receiving one vote in the just concluded Presidential polls from the state.
